mapper.select: select * from s_upms_route where id in( select route_id from s_upms_route_link where (target_id in(select id from s_upms_user_role where user_id = #{userId}) and target_type="role") or (target_id in(select menu_id from s_upms_role_menu where role_id in (select id from s_upms_user_role where user_id = #{userId})) and target_type="menu") )
